Please follow these instructions to enable Javascript. sale pending $236,500 5 Bosi Court, Bolingbrook IL 60490 gorgeous former model home located in cul de sac upgrades throughout. first floor master suite with recessed lighting, tray ceiling, mb w/separate tub/shower. double sinks. 3 car garage. kitchen boasts granite counter tops, wood flooring and ss appliances. two story family room with stone fireplace. full insulated basement. 4th bedroom could be used as second family room. custom window treatments. *short sale* housing 41.685814 -88.12632 Home Facts Photos 16 Map&Nearby Mortgage Sales Trends Schools Photos of 5 Bosi Court, Bolingbrook IL View large photos (16) Watch virtual tour
